---
description: Generated data files in site/data directory
applyTo: "site/data/**"
---

Most files in the `site/data/` directory are automatically generated by PowerShell scripts. DO NOT manually edit generated files as changes will be overwritten.

## Generated Files (DO NOT EDIT)

Root level files:

- `collection.captions.*` - Caption data in JSON/YAML formats
- `coursePrices.json` - Course pricing data
- `pricing-zone.json` - Pricing zone information
- `tagsSource.json` - Tags reference data
- `trainingRates.json` - Training rates data
- `youtube.json` - YouTube integration data

Directory structures with generated files:

- `classification/[categories|concepts|tags]/{id}/`
  - `classifications.json` - Generated by `.powershell\build\Update-ClassificationFrontMatter.ps1`
  - `related.json` - Generated by `.powershell\build\Update-HugoRelatedCache.ps1`
  - Example: `site\data\classification\categories\_O7H5eH902L\classifications.json`
- `marketing/[capabilities|outcomes]/{id}/` - Marketing data files
- `program/[course|mentor-program]/{id}/` - Program data files
- `resource/[blog|videos|guides|case-studies|engineering-notes|learning-series|newsletters|podcast|principles|recipes|signals|workshops]/{id}/` - Resource data files

## Manually Maintained Files

- `program/*/*/syllabus.yaml` - Course syllabus files (manually created and edited)

To update generated files, edit the source content in `site/content/` and run the appropriate PowerShell scripts from `.powershell/` directory.
